title: Lovers' Lane Bridge over the Ashuelot River, Keene, New Hampshire
marks:
Title and Inscription

on mount, below LLC of sh in lower margin of mount, printed in grey: [LOVERS
description: view of a bridge over calm water; man and two boys seated on bridge, fishing; two standing ladies look over railing; parked carriage at right; man and girl stand in boat near tree at shore; mounted on card with title and photographer\'s initials
creditline: Gift of Paula and Mack Lee
